kpi.cnname: 工单号, 地区名称,工单信息, 派单时间, 处理环节
kpi.sql: select m.sheetid,m.id,getareaname(m.todeptid) areaname,m.title,m.sendtime,decode(t.taskname,'','已归档','FirstExcuteHumTask' ,'T1处理','SecondExcuteHumTask' ,'T2处理') dealname from commonfault_main m,commonfault_task t where m.sendtime >sysdate -7 and m.status<>'-14' and m.deleted <>'1' and m.mainnetsortone = '101010405' and m.mainfaultresponselevel = '101030401' and m.id = t.sheetkey(+) and t.ifwaitforsubtask(+) <>'true' and t.taskstatus(+) in ('2','8') and t.taskname = 'HoldHumTask' and m.todeptid='{0}'
